original_text:
Fortune Turtle
In molte culture, la tartaruga è considerata un simbolo di buon auspicio – un presagio di fortuna e ricchezza. Simboleggia la salute, la saggezza e la pace. Secondo il simbolismo cinese, è una delle quattro creature considerate sacre, insieme alla fenice, al drago e al Qilin, che è una specie di creatura simile a un unicorno che condivide molte caratteristiche con una giraffa. Nel Feng Shui, si dice che mettere un ornamento di tartaruga nella tua casa ti porterà fortuna – e pensiamo che questa sia l’ispirazione dietro questa slot creata da Genesis Gaming.
L’azienda ha optato per una slot in denaro reale a tema orientale, un tema che è estremamente popolare all’interno dell’industria, il che naturalmente significa che è stato visto molto. Invece di ristagnare però, questa attività tenta di rinnovare ciò che si conosce e di concentrarsi sulle buone fortune di una tartaruga piuttosto che sulle geishe e le arti marziali. C’è ancora una chiara estetica in questo titolo, ma lo apprezziamo di più perché ha cercato di fare qualcosa di rinfrescante piuttosto che attenersi a ciò che conosciamo.
Una grafica per gli amanti del Sol Levante
Nonostante il fatto che abbiamo appena osservato quanto i Genesis abbiano cercato di allontanarsi dalla stereotipizzazione della loro grafica, non c’è modo di ignorare che la location del gioco è molto generica. Si tratta di un giardino giapponese, le porte di un gazebo aperto su un cielo serale immobile, le sfumature viola dei fiori aggiungono un senso di serenità. Questo non è un male però, utilizzare un’immagine che ci è familiare, in quanto ci aiuta ad adattarci da un gioco all’altro. L’innovazione è grande, ma troppo e ci sentiamo alla deriva da ciò che conosciamo.
I confini della matrice sono stati eliminati, dando la sensazione che ogni simbolo sui 5 rulli galleggi a mezz’aria, un effetto che continua quando si innescano le vincite a cascata. Ci si sente ariosi, quasi magici in qualche modo, cosa che non abbiamo sperimentato quando abbiamo giocato a Canarval Cash, anche se la matrice era attraente. Questa dinamica richiede la vostra attenzione, e chi siamo noi per ignorare un’estetica così potente?
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Il gioco beneficia di una funzione multi-cascata, dove dopo ogni vincita a cascata di successo un simbolo aggiuntivo diventerà wild. quando si crea una combo, le tessere spariscono e altre prendono il loro posto. Se dopo la prima vincita ne crei un’altra e poi un’altra ancora, le tue ricompense aumentano grazie alla tua capacità di abbinare i simboli. Tuttavia, in giochi come Tetris, è più probabile che tu ottenga le combo fin dall’inizio, poiché sei tu a determinare cosa va dove.
In Fortune Turtle, possono attivarsi in qualsiasi momento durante il gioco base, ma dovrai superare due combinazioni di fila prima di iniziare a sperimentare gli extra aggiuntivi. Per esempio, i guardiani rossi del titolo si trasformeranno in wilds per il resto delle cascate, se ottieni più di due vittorie di fila, e sono sul secondo, terzo e quarto rullo. Da lì in poi, più vittorie ottieni, più altri simboli si trasformeranno in wild, aumentando così le tue possibilità di vincita. I ritorni possono essere incredibili. La puntata minima è di 0,50, mentre la massima è di 50,00.
C’è anche un bonus di giri gratuiti che si attiva raccogliendo tre o più scatter. Durante questo giro, un nuovo simbolo di moneta d’oro sarà aggiunto al terzo rullo così come un contatore di monete, che si riempirà ogni volta che appare. Quando questo contatore di monete raggiunge tre, saranno assegnati due giri gratuiti.
Le puntate possono essere regolate per scommettere tra i 5 e i 50 euro al colpo. Mentre questa non è la puntata massima più alta là fuori, la puntata più bassa è in realtà relativamente alta, il che significa che la puntata media su questo gioco è abbastanza alta in generale. Questo rende il gioco un buon gioco per coloro che vogliono scommettere un po’ di più.
I simboli sono tutti quelli che ti aspetteresti di trovare in una generica slot orientale. Questi includono germogli di bambù e alberi bonsai, insieme ai simboli del mazzo di carte che pagano meno. La tartaruga della fortuna agisce come simbolo scatter sui rulli due, tre e quattro. L’uomo dal ventre piatto agisce come wild, che sostituisce tutti i simboli tranne gli scatter.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Se hai letto questa recensione, allora significa che sei particolarmente amante delle Slot Machine a tema orientale. Se è così, allora troverai in Genesis Gaming pane per i tuoi denti. Scopri subito tutti gli altri titoli simili di questo produttore!

raw_translation.response:
Fortune Turtle

In many cultures, the turtle is considered a symbol of good luck - a harbinger of wealth and fortune. It symbolizes health, wisdom, and peace. According to Chinese symbolism, it is one of the four creatures considered sacred, along with the phoenix, dragon, and Qilin, which is a creature similar to a unicorn that shares many characteristics with a giraffe. In Feng Shui, it is said that putting a turtle ornament in your home will bring you luck - and we think this is the inspiration behind this slot created by Genesis Gaming.

The company has opted for an oriental-themed real money slot, a theme that is extremely popular within the industry, which of course means it has been seen a lot. However, instead of stagnating, this activity tries to renew what is known and focus on the good fortunes of a turtle rather than geishas and martial arts. There is still a clear aesthetic in this title, but we appreciate it more because it has tried to do something refreshing rather than sticking to what we know.

Graphics for lovers of the Far East

Despite the fact that we have just observed how much Genesis has tried to move away from the stereotyping of their graphics, there is no way to ignore that the game's location is very generic. It is a Japanese garden, the doors of a gazebo open to a still night sky, the purple hues of the flowers adding a sense of serenity. This is not a bad thing though, using an image that is familiar to us, as it helps us adapt from game to game. The innovation is great, but too much and we feel adrift from what we know.

The borders of the matrix have been removed, giving the feeling that each symbol on the 5 reels is floating in the air, an effect that continues when cascade wins are triggered. It feels airy, almost magical in some way, something we did not experience when we played Canarval Cash, even though the matrix was attractive. This dynamic requires your attention, and who are we to ignore such a powerful aesthetic?

Functions and symbols of the Slot Machine

The game benefits from a multi-cascade function, where after every successful cascade win an additional symbol will become wild. When you create a combo, the tiles disappear and others take their place. If after the first win you create another and then another, your rewards increase thanks to your ability to match symbols. However, in games like Tetris, it is more likely that you will get the combos from the beginning, as you determine what goes where.

In Fortune Turtle, they can be triggered at any time during the base game, but you will need to overcome two row combinations before you start experiencing the additional extras. For example, the red guardians of the title will turn into wilds for the rest of the cascades, if you get more than two wins in a row, and they are on the second, third, and fourth reel. From there on, the more wins you get, the more other symbols will turn into wild, thus increasing your chances of winning. The returns can be amazing. The minimum bet is 0.50, while the maximum is 50.00.

There is also a free spins bonus that is activated by collecting three or more scatters. During this spin, a new gold coin symbol will be added to the third reel as well as a coin counter, which will fill up every time it appears. When this coin counter reaches three, two free spins will be awarded.

Bets can be adjusted to bet between 5 and 50 euros per spin. While this is not the highest maximum bet out there, the lowest bet is actually relatively high, meaning that the average bet on this game is quite high overall. This makes the game a good game for those who want to bet a little more.

The symbols are all those you would expect to find in a generic oriental slot. These include bamboo sprouts and bonsai trees, along with the card deck symbols that pay less. The lucky turtle acts as a scatter symbol on reels two, three, and four. The flat-bellied man acts as a wild, which replaces all symbols except the scatter.

Other similar Slot Machines

If you have read this review, it means that you are particularly fond of oriental-themed Slot Machines. If so, then you will find plenty more similar titles from this developer!

Are you ready to welcome good fortune into your life with the new slot game Fortune Turtle? The game takes players to the mystical lands of Asia, where they can experience the thrill of gambling while surrounded by oriental symbols. And if you think winning big in an online slot game is only a dream, then Fortune Turtle is here to prove you wrong.

And let's be real, it's not that hard to do. Once you're in the free spins round, a new gold coin symbol is introduced on the third reel and a coin counter is added. Every time this shiny little coin appears, the coin counter starts filling up. And when it reaches three, you are rewarded with two more free spins. Talk about a cycle of winning and getting more chances to win!

Now, we all need to have some good laughs in life, and Fortune Turtle delivers those as well. Wondering how? Picture this: a turtle in a Chinese hat sitting on top of a pile of gold coins, with confetti and a celebratory tune playing in the background every time the reels are spun. And let's not forget the lucky golden cat that pops up to bring you more winning opportunities. Trust us, the quirky graphics and fun sound effects will have you giggling in no time.

All in all, if you're looking for a slot game that caters to your quest for fun and fortune, Fortune Turtle is the way to go. So what are you waiting for? Start spinning those reels and let the good times roll!

About Fortune Turtle Slot Game

Fortune Turtle is a real money slot game with an oriental theme developed by Genesis Gaming. The game is based on the belief in many cultures, where the turtle is considered a sign of good luck and a symbol of fortune and wealth. The game features aesthetically pleasing graphics and animations, with a Japanese garden as the backdrop.

About Genesis Gaming

Genesis Gaming is an online gaming software provider that offers various online casino games and slots. The company creates innovative and engaging games that feature high-quality graphics and animations. The company has gained popularity because of its oriental-themed and captivating real-money slots. Genesis Gaming is a company that is licensed, regulated, and certified by various national and international gaming authorities.

Oriental Theme

Oriental themes are widely popular in the online casino industry, and the Fortune Turtle is an exciting addition to the collection. It features a Japanese garden with serene surroundings, including violet flowers and evening skies. The use of familiar settings helps players adapt to the theme. The game has tried to distance itself from the more stereotypical oriental slots, and focuses more on the good fortune behind a turtle.

Multi-cascade Function

Fortune Turtle benefits from a multi-cascade feature. After every successful win, an additional symbol will become wild, and the tiles disappear and are replaced with others. Players create combos by matching symbols and the rewards increase exponentially. The more victories you get, the higher the chances of other symbols turning into wilds, thereby increasing your chances of winning. This dynamic requires attention, making it a more engaging and exciting experience for players. The multi-cascade feature can be activated at any time during the base game. However, players need to pass two rows of combinations before experiencing the additional extras.

Free Spins Bonus

The game features a free spins bonus that players can trigger with three or more scatters. During the free spins, a new gold coin symbol will be added to the third reel, and a coin counter will be created. The coin counter fills up every time it appears and awards two free spins when it reaches three. The game is also a great choice for players who like to bet higher amounts, with a maximum bet of 50 euros.

Betting Options

Fortune Turtle offers a minimum bet of 0.50 euros and a maximum bet of 50.00 euros, making it a great game for both high rollers and low rollers. Although the maximum bet might not be the highest available, the minimum bet is relatively high, making the average bet quite high overall. This makes the game an excellent choice for those who want to bet a little more.

Similar Titles from Genesis Gaming

If you're a fan or enjoy playing online slot games with an oriental theme, there are plenty of other games from Genesis Gaming that you can try. Some similar titles include Leprechaun Legends, Night of Sevens, and Crystal Crater. These games feature the same high-quality graphics and animations found in Fortune Turtle that players love and enjoy.

Review: Fortune Turtle:

In many cultures, the turtle is considered a symbol of good luck - a harbinger of fortune and wealth. It symbolizes health, wisdom, and peace. According to Chinese symbolism, it is one of four creatures deemed sacred, along with the Phoenix, Dragon, and Qilin - a unicorn-like creature that shares many characteristics with a giraffe. In Feng Shui, it is said that placing a turtle ornament in your home will bring you luck - and we think this is the inspiration behind this slot created by Genesis Gaming.

The company has opted for a real money slot with an oriental theme - a theme that is extremely popular within the industry, which of course means it has been seen a lot. Instead of stagnating, however, this activity attempts to renew what is known and focus on the good fortune of a turtle rather than geishas and martial arts. There is still a clear aesthetic in this title, but we appreciate it more because it has tried to do something refreshing rather than sticking to what we know.

Graphics for lovers of the Levant Sun

Despite the fact that we have just observed how Genesis tried to distance themselves from the stereotyping of their graphics, there is no way to ignore that the game's location is very generic. It is a Japanese garden, the doors of a gazebo open onto a motionless evening sky, violet shades of flowers add a sense of serenity. This is not bad though, using an image that is familiar to us, as it helps us adapt from one game to the next. Innovation is great, but too much and we feel adrift from what we know.

The borders of the matrix have been removed, giving the feeling that every symbol on the 5 reels floats in mid-air, an effect that continues when cascade wins are triggered. It feels airy, almost magical in some way, something we didn't experience when we played Canarval Cash, although the matrix was attractive. This dynamic requires your attention, and who are we to ignore such a powerful aesthetic?

Features and Symbols of the Slot Machine

The game benefits from a multi-cascade function, where after every successful cascade win an additional symbol will become wild. when you create a combo, the tiles disappear and others take their place. If you create another and then another after the first win, your rewards increase thanks to your ability to match symbols. However, in games like Tetris, it is more likely that you will get combos from the start, as you determine what goes where.

In Fortune Turtle, they can be activated at any time during the base game, but you will need to pass two rows of combinations before you start experiencing the additional extras. For example, the red guardians of the title will turn into wilds for the rest of the cascades if you get more than two wins in a row, and they are on the second, third, and fourth reels. From there on, the more victories you get, the more other symbols will turn into wilds, thereby increasing your chances of winning. Returns can be incredible. The minimum bet is 0.50, while the maximum is 50.00.

There is also a free spins bonus that is triggered by collecting three or more scatters. During this spin, a new gold coin symbol will be added to the third reel as well as a coin counter, which will fill up every time it appears. When this coin counter reaches three, two free spins will be awarded.

Bets can be adjusted to bet between 5 and 50 euros per shot. While this is not the highest maximum bet out there, the lowest bet is actually relatively high, meaning that the average bet on this game is quite high overall. This makes the game a good game for those who want to bet a little more.

The symbols are all those that you would expect to find in a generic oriental slot. These include bamboo shoots and bonsai trees, along with card deck symbols that pay less. The Fortune Turtle acts as a scatter symbol on reels two, three, and four. The man with the flat stomach acts as a wild, which replaces all symbols except scatter symbols.

Other Similar Slot Machines

If you have read this review, then it means you are particularly fond of slot machines with an oriental theme. If so, then you will find plenty of similar titles from this manufacturer on offer!
